I can see the issues. The project is failing due to Mockito compatibility issues. The newer version of Mockito (5.13.0) has changed its API:
1. `org.mockito.runners.MockitoJUnitRunner` no longer exists - need to use `org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnitRunner`
2. `org.mockito.Matchers` class has been removed - need to use `org.mockito.ArgumentMatchers` instead
